posts.author: Ius
posts.content:
I apologize for making a whole new thread just to ask one question. That being said I SWEAR I saw a build once called The Charismatic Ranger, but I've been looking high and low for it all day and haven't found it. Does anyone have a link, or a copy of the build draft? Thanks!

Sent from my moto g 5G - 2024 using Tapatalk

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
*blinks*

Would you happen to know which Classes the build contained besides Ranger?

I was only able to find this - https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... 16038.html

Mighty Warrior of the North (Ranger 21/Paladin 15/HS 4)

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
I've found 4 in the currently-configured ECB archive. They're all in our level 40 forum, all by Tyr Templar, and all originally posted in November 2012. Afraid I don't seem able to make links atm, sorry, but they should be relatively easy to find. (They were part of Tyr's Robin Hood theme of the time)

Lionheart Ranger: Ranger 26/ Paladin 4/ CoT 10 (CHA 16)
Lionheart Paladin: Paladin 24/ Ranger 10/ CoT 6 (CHA 16)
Dark Warden: Ranger 26/ Fighter 10/ BG 4 (CHA 16)
Alan-A-Dale: Bard 15/ Ranger 25 (CHA 15)

Hope this helps

posts.author: Ius
posts.content:
Thanks guys! These are very helpful

Sent from my moto g 5G - 2024 using Tapatalk
